events.message: The customer reported filing a claim following a car collision that occurred on the morning of May 9th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords identifying vehicle collision and damages.
An agent was promptly assigned to the claim to provide support and gather additional information from the claimant.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed it will be processed in due course.
Request sent to customer for submitting vehicle damage photos, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer provided all requested documents including images of the car, repair quotes, and official police collision report.
Investigation began with a review of submitted evidence and contacting involved parties for further details.
The investigation process concluded with confirmation of liability and assessment of damage extent.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount based on repair quotes and policy coverage limits.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the transparency of the claim process.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company, confirming the agreed payout amount.
The settlement payment was issued and transferred to the claimantâ€™s bank account without delay.
The claim case was officially closed following full payment and completion of all procedural requirements.
